---
title: Update a membership
---

# Update a membership

<mark>Add payload</mark>

You can update the permissions for an existing account membership, as well as the account member's personal information.

If you have an account membership with a **user binding error**, you can use the `updateAccountMembership` mutation to fix it.

:::tip Web Banking
Your users can update their account member's rights from Swan's Web Banking interface.
:::

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `updateAccountMembership` mutation.
1. Add the account membership ID.
1. Add any information you'd like to update or permissions you'd like to change.
1. Add the success payload.
1. Add any rejections you'd like.

## API mutation {#suspend-mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {4} showLineNumbers
mutation UpdateMembership {
  updateAccountMembership(
    input: {
      accountMembershipId: "$ACCOUNT_MEMBERSHIP_ID"
      consentRedirectUrl: "$YOUR_CONSENT_REDIRECT_URL"
      canInitiatePayments: true
      canManageAccountMembership: true
      canManageBeneficiaries: true
      canManageCards: true
      canViewAccount: true
    }
  ) {
    ... on UpdateAccountMembershipSuccessPayload {
      __typename
    }
    ... on AccountMembershipCannotBeUpdatedRejection {
      id
      message
    }
  }
}

```

## Payload {#suspend-payload}

The payload shows that the account membership ...

